communities.name: Academy Park
communities.headline: Now Selling: New Homes in Beaufort
communities.description: Located next to Beaufort Academy, Academy Park features incredible upscale designs with luxury craftsmanship in homes designed for the modern family. Just 10 minutes from beautiful downtown Beaufort, Academy Park residents have easy access to the area's best restaurants, shops, parks, and beautiful scenery. Pristine beaches are only a short drive away, and Savannah International Airport is nearby.Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Ashley Cove
communities.headline: Now selling! New homes in Summerville, SC
communities.description: Ashley Cove is ideally located only six miles from I-26 and Summerville shopping, dining, and other conveniences. Plus, a short drive to downtown Charleston and Charleston-area beaches including Isle of Palms and Sullivan's Island. With only 14 homesites, Ashley Cove will feature some of Eastwood's most popular home designs which include sought-after features such as guest suites, optional bonus rooms, and thoughtfully designed gathering spaces.Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Church Creek Landing
communities.headline: Homes with personal or shared docks in Charleston, SC
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to build new, Charleston-inspired homes in Church Creek Landing, an intimate community offering interior homesites, and a limited number of deepwater homesites, from the mid $900s, some with personal docks and shared docks, in a convenient Charleston location. Residents will enjoy Pierpoint Boat Landing plus nature trails located just outside of Church Creek Landing and great access to shops, restaurants, and other conveniences. Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Landings at Sweetwater
communities.headline: Coming soon - Gorgeous Homes In An Amenity-Packed Community
communities.description: Sweetwater is located within two miles of prestigious Daniel Island, which is known for its serene waterfront and marsh views, miles of nature and bike trails, local pubs, boutique-style restaurants, small island shops, and true Charleston-style living. Residents of Landings at Sweetwater will enjoy the luxury of a relaxed island atmosphere. This thriving community is less than 15 miles from the beach and historic, downtown Charleston.Sign up for our VIP List for updates on this great community!

communities.name: Magnolia Pointe
communities.headline: Now selling!
communities.description: Magnolia Pointe, nestled off Otranto Road in the heart of North Charleston, offers a collection of Eastwood Homes' most popular home designs in an unparalleled location close to I-26. Residents will enjoy Wannamaker Park, restaurants, and a variety of retail, just around the corner. Plus an easy drive to historic downtown Charleston including upscale shopping, dining, sightseeing, and Charleston-area beaches including Isle of Palms and Sullivan's Island.

communities.name: New Riverside Village
communities.headline: New 3-Story Townhomes With Garages For Sale In Bluffton, SC
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to announce New Riverside Village, just minutes away from exciting downtown Bluffton and a few miles from many Hilton Head beaches. New Riverside Village is convenient to exquisite dining, local boutiques, and a ton of entertainment. Residents will enjoy boating, fishing, and much more only a short drive away, and downtown Savannah, GA is less than a 15-minute drive. Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Oakley Pointe
communities.headline: Single-Family Homes Near Shopping, Dining, & Schools
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to build new homes in Oakley Pointe, an established community of homes convenient to both Moncks Corner and Roper St. Francis Hospital, and Summerville, SC. Oakley Pointe features some of Eastwood's most popular home designs plus residents will enjoy the pool, playground, and convenient boat storage. Current community amenity improvements are coming soon including a proposed splash pad. Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Parker's Preserve
communities.headline: Now selling!
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to announce Parker's Preserve, a new community just moments from Summerville, SC, and a quick drive to upscale shopping, dining, historic sites, and recreational activities in Charleston. Parker's Preserve will feature a collection of thoughtfully designed homes in a quiet setting, surrounded by open space and wetland conservation areas. Select homes will feature up to six bedrooms, first-floor primary bedrooms, and lofts plus well-appointed kitchens, home offices, and outdoor living areas.Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: The Bluffs at Pinefield Townhomes
communities.headline: Townhomes for Sale in Charleston, SC.
communities.description: The Bluffs at Pinefield townhomes features a stunning new collection of Charleston-inspired, three-story townhomes with attached, one-car garages that are a short drive to boating, sailing, and swimming on the Cooper River. Featuring large kitchens with islands, spacious family rooms, and spa-like baths, these townhomes are ideally located less than one mile from I-526 for easy drives to all Charleston-area attractions including upscale shopping, dining, and sightseeing in downtown Charleston. Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: The Enclave at French Quarter Creek
communities.headline: Outstanding Planned Community Amenities
communities.description: The Enclave at French Quarter Creek offers beautiful homes with first-floor primary suites, spa-like baths, and stylish kitchens in a serene area, with outstanding planned amenities, only 25 minutes from Mount Pleasant and 20 minutes to I-526, just on the outskirts of Charleston. Residents will enjoy the future pool, cabana, and fishing ponds.  We are open daily but hours vary, so schedule your visit today!

communities.name: The Landings at Montague
communities.headline: Now Selling- Schedule your visit today!
communities.description: This new phase of 53 townhomes at The Landings at Montague will feature a peaceful setting with a pond in the heart of the neighborhood. Located off Hwy 52, with other major highways nearby, residents will enjoy nearby shopping and dining in the Goose Creek area. Homeowners will appreciate a short commute to the desirable downtown Charleston area and experience all its classic treasures.Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: The Retreat at Brownswood
communities.headline: Now selling! Charleston-Style Homes Near Downtown Charleston
communities.description: The Retreat at Brownswood offers residents serene, low-country living in a premier Johns Island location with the convenience of shopping, dining, and exploration in historic, downtown Charleston, a short 10 miles away. Charleston-style home designs will feature raised foundations with drive-under garages, and unique, beautiful interior and exterior detail. Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Thistledown Farms
communities.headline: Coming Soon - Single Family Homes for Sale in Ridgeville
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to announce Thistledown Farms in Ridgeville, a quiet community not far from I-26. With only 15 opportunities at Thistledown Farms, residents will enjoy spacious homesites averaging over an acre in size in a serene location with outstanding Cane Bay Schools.

division.name: Charleston
division.intro: As a new home builder, Eastwood offers new homes in popular Charleston-area communities.
division.description: Charleston, the oldest city in South Carolina, and the surrounding areas offer a rich history of cobblestone streets, pastel-colored homes, and cultural landmarks, all located along the banks of the Ashley, Cooper, and Wando rivers. The low-country is home to major employers in the public and private sector including Joint Base Charleston a US military facility, Medical University of South Carolina, and Boeing. Other industries in this bustling coastal area include automotive, IT, and energy to name a few. Learn more about our new communities and homes in Charleston, SC.

highlights.name: The Battery
highlights.description: The Battery, located along the lower shores of Charleston Harbor was once a Civil-war era seawall designed for coastal artillery defense. Today, it is used primarily as a promenade along the shores of the rivers to soak in the sea air and view the historic antebellum homes which line Bay Street.

highlights.name: Patriots Point
highlights.description: Patriots Point offers a glimpse at naval and maritime retired vessels from various times in our nation's history. The centerpiece is the USS Yorktown, a 27,000+ ton aircraft carrier which served in World War II and received eleven battle stars. Also on display are the USS Laffey, USS Clagamore, a submarine from the Cold War era, and numerous aircraft.

highlights.name: Fort Sumter
highlights.description: As a part of the National Park Service, Fort Sumter is a historical park of South Carolina and was an important battle field in the Civil War. Accessible only by ferry, Fort Sumter offers tours year round.
